post_title: FS: Graded T206. Commons, HOF, and a Tolstoi!
post_content:
Trying to build my way up to a Cobb. 
FS: 

Bresnahan Piedmont Batting PSA 3: $OLD

Admiral Schlei Tolstoi SGC A: $160

Harry Davis Old Mill PSA 2: $OLD

Fred Jacklitsch Sweet Cap SGC 3.5 - $OLD
